nodes.title: C1 - Provide text descriptions of imagery

quote.quote: What's this photo? It doesn't have alt text, so my [screen reader](glossary link) can't read it.

body.body: Provide [text descriptions](glossary link) of imagery (like photos and diagrams) to describe it to people who are blind or visually impaired.

quote.quote: There's a cool new podcast that I want to read, but it doesn't have a transcript.

body.body: Provide transcripts of audio content thatâ€™s pre-recorded (like podcasts) and live (like speeches) for people who are deaf or hard of hearing.
